participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and detail-oriented, Emma enjoys planning family activities and is passionate about healthy living.
participant_1.background: i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i'm an economics major. i'm married with two kids. i eat a raw diet.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and thoughtful, Jake is determined to make his mark in the legal field and often dreams big.
participant_2.background: my family has raised horses for a generations. i dream of moving to the city. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i want to be a lawyer.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
